node.text: Niceday is a manufacturing brand focusing on Mid and High-End home fitness equipment. We pursue the ultimate in quality and experience.
We sincerely hope our products bring real happiness to our customers and enhance their life.
In the Aspect of Manufacturing Strength
We have more than 30 years of experience in supplying famous American brands, our technology and competency coexist, and we have a sound R&D, production, and inspection team.
In the Aspect of Product Quality
We are more concerned about the user's family health, and all of our products are made of brand-new materials with tasteless and harmless.
We truly welcome people who love fitness all over the world to join the Niceday family and gratefully appreciate all users who select Niceday.

node.text: Niceday Under Desk Elliptical, Manual Quiet Elliptical, Foot Pedal Exerciser, Mini Elliptical Mac...
The smart LCD digital monitor helps you to track data of COUNT, TIME, CAL, SCAN, and REPS/MIN, letting you know about your exercise effects anytime.
Comes with high elastic resistance bands. It can help you exercise your arms, back, and core to achieve the purpose of rapid fat-burning and shaping.
Not only doubles the resistance but also improves the smoothness and stability of the steps, ensuring an absolutely safe and silent experience.
Niceday stepper has a maximum stride length of 15 IN and a minimum stride length of 5 IN. You can use it for daily exercise or for shaping purposes.

Promote Fat Burning: The Niceday stair stepper accelerates the fat burning of the buttocks and legs through continuous stepping; Persistent high cardio stepper for exercise can quickly reduce the lower limbs' fat and enhance muscle strength, achieving the goal of lifting buttocks and thinning legs

Work Super Quietly: There is a silent silicone cushioning pad under the Niceday stepper machine, you will be cushioned when stepping, the sound of movement is only 25 dB, don't worry about waking up the child sleeping at home

High Resistance Cardio Exercise: Niceday stepper's smooth hydraulic system will maintain high resistance for 30 minutes in each exercise cycle to help you burn fat quickly; The resistance will gradually decrease after 30 minutes to help you keep in the cardio state and achieve the best exercise effect

Exercise Anytime & Anywhere: The Niceday stepper is ready to use right out of the box; It's easy to move to any room with a weight of only 16 pounds; It is an enjoyable workout no matter stepping while watching TV or doing leg training beside a standing office desk

Space Saving & Easy Storage: The size of the Niceday stepper is 16*12*14IN and only requires a footprint of 1.29FT²; The compact size fits in any limited space, so you can start stepping anywhere and store it in any tight corner
300 LBS Loading Capacity: The loading structure of the Niceday stepper is made of 1.5MM thick commercial steel, which ensures absolute stability and 300LBS loading capacity

Strengthen Balance & Core Muscles: There is a stride adjustment knob at the bottom of the Niceday stepper; You can adjust the height of the steps according to your needs to work on balance and strengthen your core muscles; A low stride makes it easier to step to extend your exercise time, and a high stride will burn more calories
Track Exercise Data: The smart LCD digital monitor helps you to track data of COUNT, TIME, CAL, SCAN, and REPS/MIN, letting you know about your exercise effects anytime

Whole Body Exercise: The Niceday Stepper contains two high elastic resistance bands; You can perform upper body exercises while stepping to achieve the goal of the whole body burning fat and sculpting

Service Assurance: We promise to provide 2 years service for Niceday steppers; If there is any problem with the product, We accept unconditionally no-cost returns or exchanges; Please don't hesitate to contact us if you need help, and we will reply to your message within 12 hours

node.content-desc: Customer reviews 4.4 out of 5 stars 10,022 global ratings

node.text: Customers find the stepper effective and easy to assemble, with clear instructions for immediate use. They appreciate its compact design that fits under beds and saves space, while also being lightweight and easy to move around the house. The build quality is solid, and customers consider it worth the price. The noise level receives mixed feedback - while some find it super quiet, others mention it squeaks a lot after a few minutes of use.

Top reviews from the United States
Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2025

I bought this stepper as a way to add some additional cardio to my workouts. This was a great choice! Very easy to use and gets the heart rate into the cardio zone quickly. I’ve owned and used it regularly for a week now, and no complaints so far! Good price, no assembly...
Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2025

This product has exceeded my expectations. I had relatively low expectations when I ordered these steppers simply because of the price. I was expecting a cheaply made piece of equipment that wouldn’t work properly or would struggle to work smoothly, but what I received was...
excellent stepper, burner workout, but probably not suitable for those with downstairs neighbors
Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2024

small, lightweight, great workout, affordable. perfect for those who work from home and want to keep moving during long meetings without being too distracting on camera. even when i use it with a rug, yoga mat, or other barrier (and on carpted floors), the...
Best workout machine I’ve bought here on Amazon!
Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2025

I normally don’t write reviews unless I really feel strongly about a product and let’s just say I’m really impressed with this little machine it’s small quiet fits perfect in my room (I put it in the room Im least motivated in and it’s definitely made a difference I feel...
Just buy it! It's so convenient and effective
Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2025
It's solid, it's effective, it gets your heartbeat rate up, it makes your muscles scream but work your way up it's deceiving. If you can spare 10 minutes per day you will feel the difference. Trust!
Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2024

I got my stepper yesterday and I was so excited to try it out! My first thoughts: - It’s already assembled so that’s great. - It’s heavy and sturdy. - I of course had to try it out and you can DEFINITELY feel your glutes and legs working!! It burns after...
Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2025
Needed to change up my exercise regimen and this did the trick. Really good work out every morning. Compact but sturdy. Great value. Operates smoothly and quietly.
Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2024

Okay let me start by saying, this is a really good little stepper. I bought it a couple weeks ago and wanted to try it for a few weeks so I can give an honest, fair review. Comes put together. Only thing you have to assemble is the straps (super easy to clip on). Very...
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 12, 2024
The accessories were missing I don't want a refund but couldn't see from the options how to request the missing parts without doing a refund. Please contact me as I need assistance.
Decent, but loudish and the monitor doesn't work

This machine is good if you have a watch or cellphone that keeps track of steps because like a lot of other people have mentioned, the panel doesn't work. As soon as i opened the package, it wasn't working. I changed the batteries and it worked one time, then...
